sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'

import {
    FormControl,
    FormLabel,
    FormHelperText,
    Input,
    Center
} from '@chakra-ui/react'  

const AddRecipe = () => {
  return (
    <>
        <FormControl>
            <FormLabel style = {{textAlign: 'center', fontSize: 'max(1.5vw, 15px)'}}>Name</FormLabel>
            <Center>
                <Input     
                    isInvalid
                    errorBorderColor='red.300'
                    placeholder='Here is a sample placeholder'
                    width = '40%' 
                    borderColor='green.400'
                />
            </Center>
        </FormControl>    
    </>
    )
}

export default AddRecipe
